hero.name: Acharya Sumit Tiwari
hero.p1: Acharya Sumit Tiwari (Vedic Astrologer) is a well-known astrologer in Lucknow with more than 19+ years of experience. He offers very simple and logical remedies that are highly effective. His articles have also been published in various news portals.
hero.p2: He holds a B.Com from Lucknow University, a Shastri degree in Vedic Jyotish from Central Sanskrit University, Lucknow, and a post-graduation in Astrology (M.A. Jyotirvigyan) from Lucknow University under the guidance of Padma Shri Professor B.K. Shukla. He has helped many people through his readings and predictions to overcome obstacles in their lives.
hero.p3: If you choose him, you’ve already made one of the best decisions of your life. Contact Acharya Ji for scientific and logical analysis of your Kundli.

timeline.heading: About Acharya Ji
timeline.branch1: From an early age, his family observed a natural inclination towards spiritual practices. Several astrologers studied his birth chart and predicted a life path closely aligned with spirituality and Jyotish.
timeline.branch2: He was blessed by his Guru, the great Sanskrit scholar and Katha Vyas, Param Pujya Swami Maheshanand Saraswati Ji Maharaj. Under Swami Ji’s guidance and companionship, he entered the path of spirituality — a true path of sadhana.
timeline.branch3: Over the years, he has guided respected individuals across Uttar Pradesh through spiritual practices, astrology, and gem consultation.
